attributes.action: introduce a selective employment tax on employers whose employees travel to work more than, say, 25 miles per day untless they do so by public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposal would encourage employers to recruit from their local area. They would have to pay a tax of, say, £1 per day for each employee who travels to work more than, say, 25 miles unless they do so by public transport. This would help to reduce unnecessary commuter mileage.
